summary_gpt: The filing announces the schedule for IHCL's Q4 and FY 2024-25 results presentation via a global conference call on May 5, 2025, including dial-in details for international participants. It is a routine disclosure under SEBI regulations, providing transparency about upcoming financial disclosures.

The company, Indhotel, has scheduled a board meeting on May 5, 2025, to approve its audited financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2025, and to recommend a dividend. The trading window has been closed from March 25, 2025, until 48 hours after the results are announced.
